name: FUT Competition 19
description:
Create your ultimate competition team, subscribe to competitions and earn, buy, and win FUT competition coins. Make your team the best and win your competitions.

The teams and players in the FUT Competition app are different than your FUT account or any other application from Electronic Arts Inc. This app (FUT Competition) is not endorsed by or affiliated with Electronic Arts Inc.

All trademarks and copyrights belong to their respective owners.
